Class King

    This class is for the Knight and determines whether a move is valid has it's toString implementation.

    • Constructor Detail

      • King

        public King​(int row,
            int col,
            int player)
        This is a constructor to initialize a King object with its current row and column and whether it is black or white.
        Parameters:
        row - - the current row of the King object on the board
        col - - the current column of the King object on the board
        player - - whether it is a black or white piece. 0 = white and 1 = black

    • Method Detail

      • isValidMove

        public boolean isValidMove​(int r,
                           int c,
                           Board board)
        This method checks to see whether a move entered by the client can be made by the King
        Specified by:
        isValidMove in class Piece
        Parameters:
        r - -the ending row position for where the client wants to move piece
        c - -the ending column position for where the client wants to move piece
        board - -Board object that stores the current 2D Piece array
        Returns:
        boolean-to see if entered move is possible for the current piece
